name: Scare
text: This spell functions like cause fear, except that it causes all targeted creatures of less than 6 HD to become frightened.
component_text: V, S, M (a bone from an undead creature)

effects.text: one living creature per three levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
effects.name: Targets

components.text: a bone from an undead creature

duration: 1 round/level or 1 round; see text for cause fear
